Rx Sample Discard

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x64
Size:
0x4
Source:
msk_top_regs.rdl

Description

Configure samples discard operation for demodulator

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] - - - -
[15:8] rx_nco_discard rw 0x0 Rx NCO Sample Discard Value
[7:0] rx_sample_discard rw 0x0 Rx Sample Discard Value

Field Descriptions

rx_nco_discard - Rx NCO Sample Discard Value

Number of NCO samples to discard

rx_sample_discard - Rx Sample Discard Value

Number of Rx samples to discard
